14394 ImVec2 p0 = CalcTextSize(line_begin, p);
14395 ImVec2 p1 = CalcTextSize(p, p + 10);
14396 g.LastItemData.Rect = ImRect(text_rect.Min + ImVec2(p0.x, 0.0f), text_rect.Min + ImVec2(p0.x + p1.x, p1.y));
14397 if (IsMouseHoveringRect(g.LastItemData.Rect.Min, g.LastItemData.Rect.Max, true))
14398 DebugLocateItemOnHover(id);
14399 p += 10;
14400 }
14401 }
14402 if (GetScrollY() >= GetScrollMaxY())
14403 SetScrollHereY(1.0f);
14404 EndChild();
14405
14406 End();
14407}
14408
14409//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14410// [SECTION] OTHER DEBUG TOOLS (ITEM PICKER, STACK TOOL)
14411//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14412
14413static const ImU32 DEBUG_LOCATE_ITEM_COLOR = IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 255); // Green
14414
14415void ImGui::DebugLocateItem(ImGuiID target_id)
14416{
14417 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14418 g.DebugLocateId = target_id;
14419 g.DebugLocateFrames = 2;
14420}
14421
14422void ImGui::DebugLocateItemOnHover(ImGuiID target_id)
14423{
14424 if (target_id == 0 || !IsItemHovered(ImGuiHoveredFlags_AllowWhenBlockedByActiveItem | ImGuiHoveredFlags_AllowWhenBlockedByPopup))
14425 return;
14426 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14427 DebugLocateItem(target_id);
14428 GetForegroundDrawList(g.CurrentWindow)->AddRect(g.LastItemData.Rect.Min - ImVec2(3.0f, 3.0f), g.LastItemData.Rect.Max + ImVec2(3.0f, 3.0f), DEBUG_LOCATE_ITEM_COLOR);
14429}
14430
14431void ImGui::DebugLocateItemResolveWithLastItem()
14432{
14433 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14434 ImGuiLastItemData item_data = g.LastItemData;
14435 g.DebugLocateId = 0;
14436 ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList(g.CurrentWindow);
14437 ImRect r = item_data.Rect;
14438 r.Expand(3.0f);
14439 ImVec2 p1 = g.IO.MousePos;
14440 ImVec2 p2 = ImVec2((p1.x < r.Min.x) ? r.Min.x : (p1.x > r.Max.x) ? r.Max.x : p1.x, (p1.y < r.Min.y) ? r.Min.y : (p1.y > r.Max.y) ? r.Max.y : p1.y);
14441 draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, DEBUG_LOCATE_ITEM_COLOR);
14442 draw_list->AddLine(p1, p2, DEBUG_LOCATE_ITEM_COLOR);
14443}
14444
14445// [DEBUG] Item picker tool - start with DebugStartItemPicker() - useful to visually select an item and break into its call-stack.
14446void ImGui::UpdateDebugToolItemPicker()
14447{
14448 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14449 g.DebugItemPickerBreakId = 0;
14450 if (!g.DebugItemPickerActive)
14451 return;
14452
14453 const ImGuiID hovered_id = g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame;
14454 SetMouseCursor(ImGuiMouseCursor_Hand);
14455 if (IsKeyPressed(ImGuiKey_Escape))
14456 g.DebugItemPickerActive = false;
14457 const bool change_mapping = g.IO.KeyMods == (ImGuiMod_Ctrl | ImGuiMod_Shift);
14458 if (!change_mapping && IsMouseClicked(g.DebugItemPickerMouseButton) && hovered_id)
14459 {
14460 g.DebugItemPickerBreakId = hovered_id;
14461 g.DebugItemPickerActive = false;
14462 }
14463 for (int mouse_button = 0; mouse_button < 3; mouse_button++)
14464 if (change_mapping && IsMouseClicked(mouse_button))
14465 g.DebugItemPickerMouseButton = (ImU8)mouse_button;
14466 SetNextWindowBgAlpha(0.70f);
14467 if (!BeginTooltip())
14468 return;
14469 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X", hovered_id);
14470 Text("Press ESC to abort picking.");
14471 const char* mouse_button_names[] = { "Left", "Right", "Middle" };
14472 if (change_mapping)
14473 Text("Remap w/ Ctrl+Shift: click anywhere to select new mouse button.");
14474 else
14475 TextColored(GetStyleColorVec4(hovered_id ? ImGuiCol_Text : ImGuiCol_TextDisabled), "Click %s Button to break in debugger! (remap w/ Ctrl+Shift)", mouse_button_names[g.DebugItemPickerMouseButton]);
14476 EndTooltip();
14477}
14478
14479// [DEBUG] Stack Tool: update queries. Called by NewFrame()
14480void ImGui::UpdateDebugToolStackQueries()
14481{
14482 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14483 ImGuiStackTool* tool = &g.DebugStackTool;
14484
14485 // Clear hook when stack tool is not visible
14486 g.DebugHookIdInfo = 0;
14487 if (g.FrameCount != tool->LastActiveFrame + 1)
14488 return;
14489
14490 // Update queries. The steps are: -1: query Stack, >= 0: query each stack item
14491 // We can only perform 1 ID Info query every frame. This is designed so the GetID() tests are cheap and constant-time
14492 const ImGuiID query_id = g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame ? g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame : g.ActiveId;
14493 if (tool->QueryId != query_id)
14494 {
14495 tool->QueryId = query_id;
14496 tool->StackLevel = -1;
14497 tool->Results.resize(0);
14498 }
14499 if (query_id == 0)
14500 return;
14501
14502 // Advance to next stack level when we got our result, or after 2 frames (in case we never get a result)
14503 int stack_level = tool->StackLevel;
14504 if (stack_level >= 0 && stack_level < tool->Results.Size)
14505 if (tool->Results[stack_level].QuerySuccess || tool->Results[stack_level].QueryFrameCount > 2)
14506 tool->StackLevel++;
14507
14508 // Update hook
14509 stack_level = tool->StackLevel;
14510 if (stack_level == -1)
14511 g.DebugHookIdInfo = query_id;
14512 if (stack_level >= 0 && stack_level < tool->Results.Size)
14513 {
14514 g.DebugHookIdInfo = tool->Results[stack_level].ID;
14515 tool->Results[stack_level].QueryFrameCount++;
14516 }
14517}
14518
14519// [DEBUG] Stack tool: hooks called by GetID() family functions
14520void ImGui::DebugHookIdInfo(ImGuiID id, ImGuiDataType data_type, const void* data_id, const void* data_id_end)
14521{
14522 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14523 ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;
14524 ImGuiStackTool* tool = &g.DebugStackTool;
14525
14526 // Step 0: stack query
14527 // This assumes that the ID was computed with the current ID stack, which tends to be the case for our widget.
14528 if (tool->StackLevel == -1)
14529 {
14530 tool->StackLevel++;
14531 tool->Results.resize(window->IDStack.Size + 1, ImGuiStackLevelInfo());
14532 for (int n = 0; n < window->IDStack.Size + 1; n++)
14533 tool->Results[n].ID = (n < window->IDStack.Size) ? window->IDStack[n] : id;
14534 return;
14535 }
14536
14537 // Step 1+: query for individual level
14538 IM_ASSERT(tool->StackLevel >= 0);
14539 if (tool->StackLevel != window->IDStack.Size)
14540 return;
14541 ImGuiStackLevelInfo* info = &tool->Results[tool->StackLevel];
14542 IM_ASSERT(info->ID == id && info->QueryFrameCount > 0);
14543
14544 switch (data_type)
14545 {
14546 case ImGuiDataType_S32:
14547 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "%d", (int)(intptr_t)data_id);
14548 break;
14549 case ImGuiDataType_String:
14550 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "%.*s", data_id_end ? (int)((const char*)data_id_end - (const char*)data_id) : (int)strlen((const char*)data_id), (const char*)data_id);
14551 break;
14552 case ImGuiDataType_Pointer:
14553 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "(void*)0x%p", data_id);
14554 break;
14555 case ImGuiDataType_ID:
14556 if (info->Desc[0] != 0) // PushOverrideID() is often used to avoid hashing twice, which would lead to 2 calls to DebugHookIdInfo(). We prioritize the first one.
14557 return;
14558 ImFormatString(info->Desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(info->Desc), "0x%08X [override]", id);
14559 break;
14560 default:
14561 IM_ASSERT(0);
14562 }
14563 info->QuerySuccess = true;
14564 info->DataType = data_type;
14565}
14566
14567static int StackToolFormatLevelInfo(ImGuiStackTool* tool, int n, bool format_for_ui, char* buf, size_t buf_size)
14568{
14569 ImGuiStackLevelInfo* info = &tool->Results[n];
14570 ImGuiWindow* window = (info->Desc[0] == 0 && n == 0) ? ImGui::FindWindowByID(info->ID) : NULL;
14571 if (window) // Source: window name (because the root ID don't call GetID() and so doesn't get hooked)
14572 return ImFormatString(buf, buf_size, format_for_ui ? "\"%s\" [window]" : "%s", window->Name);
14573 if (info->QuerySuccess) // Source: GetID() hooks (prioritize over ItemInfo() because we frequently use patterns like: PushID(str), Button("") where they both have same id)
14574 return ImFormatString(buf, buf_size, (format_for_ui && info->DataType == ImGuiDataType_String) ? "\"%s\"" : "%s", info->Desc);
14575 if (tool->StackLevel < tool->Results.Size) // Only start using fallback below when all queries are done, so during queries we don't flickering ??? markers.
14576 return (*buf = 0);
14577#ifdef IMGUI_ENABLE_TEST_ENGINE
14578 if (const char* label = ImGuiTestEngine_FindItemDebugLabel(GImGui, info->ID)) // Source: ImGuiTestEngine's ItemInfo()
14579 return ImFormatString(buf, buf_size, format_for_ui ? "??? \"%s\"" : "%s", label);
14580#endif
14581 return ImFormatString(buf, buf_size, "???");
14582}
14583
14584// Stack Tool: Display UI
14585void ImGui::ShowStackToolWindow(bool* p_open)
14586{
14587 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14588 if (!(g.NextWindowData.Flags & ImGuiNextWindowDataFlags_HasSize))
14589 SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(0.0f, GetFontSize() * 8.0f), ImGuiCond_FirstUseEver);
14590 if (!Begin("Dear ImGui Stack Tool", p_open) || GetCurrentWindow()->BeginCount > 1)
14591 {
14592 End();
14593 return;
14594 }
14595
14596 // Display hovered/active status
14597 ImGuiStackTool* tool = &g.DebugStackTool;
14598 const ImGuiID hovered_id = g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame;
14599 const ImGuiID active_id = g.ActiveId;
14600#ifdef IMGUI_ENABLE_TEST_ENGINE
14601 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X (\"%s\"), ActiveId: 0x%08X (\"%s\")", hovered_id, hovered_id ? ImGuiTestEngine_FindItemDebugLabel(&g, hovered_id) : "", active_id, active_id ? ImGuiTestEngine_FindItemDebugLabel(&g, active_id) : "");
14602#else
14603 Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X, ActiveId: 0x%08X", hovered_id, active_id);
14604#endif
14605 SameLine();
14606 MetricsHelpMarker("Hover an item with the mouse to display elements of the ID Stack leading to the item's final ID.\nEach level of the stack correspond to a PushID() call.\nAll levels of the stack are hashed together to make the final ID of a widget (ID displayed at the bottom level of the stack).\nRead FAQ entry about the ID stack for details.");
14607
14608 // CTRL+C to copy path
14609 const float time_since_copy = (float)g.Time - tool->CopyToClipboardLastTime;
14610 Checkbox("Ctrl+C: copy path to clipboard", &tool->CopyToClipboardOnCtrlC);
14611 SameLine();
14612 TextColored((time_since_copy >= 0.0f && time_since_copy < 0.75f && ImFmod(time_since_copy, 0.25f) < 0.25f * 0.5f) ? ImVec4(1.f, 1.f, 0.3f, 1.f) : ImVec4(), "*COPIED*");
14613 if (tool->CopyToClipboardOnCtrlC && IsKeyDown(ImGuiMod_Ctrl) && IsKeyPressed(ImGuiKey_C))
14614 {
14615 tool->CopyToClipboardLastTime = (float)g.Time;
14616 char* p = g.TempBuffer.Data;
14617 char* p_end = p + g.TempBuffer.Size;
14618 for (int stack_n = 0; stack_n < tool->Results.Size && p + 3 < p_end; stack_n++)
14619 {
14620 *p++ = '/';
14621 char level_desc[256];
14622 StackToolFormatLevelInfo(tool, stack_n, false, level_desc, IM_ARRAYSIZE(level_desc));
14623 for (int n = 0; level_desc[n] && p + 2 < p_end; n++)
14624 {
14625 if (level_desc[n] == '/')
14626 *p++ = '\\';
14627 *p++ = level_desc[n];
14628 }
14629 }
14630 *p = '\0';
14631 SetClipboardText(g.TempBuffer.Data);
14632 }
14633
14634 // Display decorated stack
14635 tool->LastActiveFrame = g.FrameCount;
14636 if (tool->Results.Size > 0 && BeginTable("##table", 3, ImGuiTableFlags_Borders))
14637 {
14638 const float id_width = CalcTextSize("0xDDDDDDDD").x;
14639 TableSetupColumn("Seed", ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthFixed, id_width);
14640 TableSetupColumn("PushID", ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthStretch);
14641 TableSetupColumn("Result", ImGuiTableColumnFlags_WidthFixed, id_width);
14642 TableHeadersRow();
14643 for (int n = 0; n < tool->Results.Size; n++)
14644 {
14645 ImGuiStackLevelInfo* info = &tool->Results[n];
14646 TableNextColumn();
14647 Text("0x%08X", (n > 0) ? tool->Results[n - 1].ID : 0);
14648 TableNextColumn();
14649 StackToolFormatLevelInfo(tool, n, true, g.TempBuffer.Data, g.TempBuffer.Size);
14650 TextUnformatted(g.TempBuffer.Data);
14651 TableNextColumn();
14652 Text("0x%08X", info->ID);
14653 if (n == tool->Results.Size - 1)
14654 TableSetBgColor(ImGuiTableBgTarget_CellBg, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Header));
14655 }
14656 EndTable();
14657 }
14658 End();
14659}
